show databases;

use usage_data;

show tables;

select * from energy_data_usage;


CREATE TABLE usage_data.energy_data_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_1 DOUBLE,
    device_2 DOUBLE,
    device_3 DOUBLE,
    device_4 DOUBLE
);


INSERT INTO energy_data_usage (id, device_1, device_2, device_3, device_4)
